name: Dr. Anupriya
description: Founder of Sakthi Dental Clinic, practicing since 2000. Former consultant at Mathura Clinic and Primary Health Center, Chandara Hospital. Expert in modern and patient-centric dental care.

name: Dr. Ananya Iyer
description: Expert in artificial dentures, crowns and smile restoration treatments.

name: Dr. Meera Subramanian
description: Specialist in root canal treatments and advanced tooth pain management.

name: Dr. Arvind Kumar
description: Performs general dental surgeries and advanced oral procedures.

name: Dr. Sneha N
description: Expert in braces and teeth alignment treatments for children and adults.

name: Dr. Srinivas Rohit Ramanujam
description: Specialist in dental implant surgeries and full mouth rehabilitation.

name: Dr. Balu
description: Performs advanced laser dental procedures with minimal pain and fast healing.

name: Dr. Vikram Raj Kishore
description: Specialist in clear aligner orthodontic treatments.

name: Dr. Ajay Kumar
description: Handles complex oral surgeries, jaw treatments and facial trauma cases.
